_meta.description: Skills du Rogue. DOUBLE scaling: base_power (flat) + scaling_percent (% ATK). Exploite les debuffs.
_meta.scaling_note: Scaling sur ATK. Rogue = DPS opportuniste qui exploite les faiblesses (debuffs sur cible).

base_skills.description_fr:
Inflige 12 (+45% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
Temps de recharge très court.
base_skills.description_en:
A swift gesture, a biting blade.
Deals 12 (+45% ATK) physical damage to one target.
Very short cooldown.

base_skills.description_fr:
Inflige 15 (+40% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi et applique 1 charge de Saignement.
Ignore la Ligne de Mire.
base_skills.description_en:
A blade that always finds its mark.
Deals 15 (+40% ATK) physical damage and applies 1 Bleed stack.
Ignores Line of Sight.

base_skills.description_fr:
Inflige 10 (+25% ATK) dégâts physiques en zone 2x2.
Applique Aveuglement : -30% de précision pendant 4s (+0.3s/lvl).
base_skills.description_en:
A cloud of acrid smoke engulfs the area.
Deals 10 (+25% ATK) physical damage in a 2x2 zone.
Applies Blind: -30% accuracy for 4s (+0.3s/lvl).

base_skills.description_fr:
Marque un ennemi pendant 4s (+0.5s/lvl).
L'ennemi marqué subit +10% de dégâts.
Toute l'équipe ignore la Ligne de Mire contre lui.
base_skills.description_en:
The Rogue's eye misses nothing.
Marks a target for 4s (+0.5s/lvl): it takes +10% damage and the entire team ignores Line of Sight against it.

base_skills.description_fr:
Inflige 20 (+50% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
+8% de dégâts par altération sur la cible (max +40%).
base_skills.description_en:
Every weakness is an opening.
Deals 20 (+50% ATK) physical damage.
+8% damage per debuff on the target (max +40%).

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 25 (+70% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
+100% de dégâts si lancé depuis la Furtivité.
skills.description_en:
A surgical strike to the target's back.
Deals 25 (+70% ATK) physical damage.
+100% damage if cast from Stealth.

skills.description_fr:
Accorde la Furtivité pendant 5s (+0.3s/lvl).
Vous devenez inciblable.
Le prochain Coup dans le Dos inflige le double de dégâts.
skills.description_en:
The shadows are your allies.
Grants Stealth for 5s (+0.3s/lvl): you become untargetable.
The next Backstab deals double damage.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 30 (+65% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
+50% de dégâts si la cible est en dessous de 30% PV.
skills.description_en:
No one sees the killing blow coming.
Deals 30 (+65% ATK) physical damage.
+50% damage if the target is below 30% HP.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 22 (+55% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
Ignore 40% de l'armure de la cible.
skills.description_en:
A shadow-forged blade that pierces through defenses.
Deals 22 (+55% ATK) physical damage.
Ignores 40% of the target's armor.

skills.description_fr: Inflige 35 (+80% ATK) dégâts physiques à l'ennemi et toutes les cases adjacentes.
skills.description_en:
A deadly dance of slashing blades.
Deals 35 (+80% ATK) physical damage to the target and all adjacent tiles.
Signature skill of the Shadowblade.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 8 (+20% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
Applique Confusion pendant 3s (+0.2s/lvl).
La cible attaque aléatoirement.
skills.description_en:
Turning foes against their own allies is child's play.
Deals 8 (+20% ATK) physical damage.
Applies Confusion for 3s (+0.2s/lvl): the target attacks randomly.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 12 (+25% ATK) dégâts physiques en ligne sur 3 ennemis.
Applique Aveuglement : -25% de précision pendant 4s (+0.25s/lvl).
skills.description_en:
Eyes lie, senses betray.
Deals 12 (+25% ATK) physical damage in a line to 3 targets.
Applies Blind: -25% accuracy for 4s (+0.25s/lvl).

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 5 (+15% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
Applique Désarmement pendant 2.5s (+0.2s/lvl).
La cible ne peut ni auto-attaquer ni lancer de sorts.
skills.description_en:
With a deft flick, the weapon leaves the enemy's hands.
Deals 5 (+15% ATK) physical damage.
Applies Disarm for 2.5s (+0.2s/lvl): the target cannot auto-attack or cast spells.

skills.description_fr:
Détourne l'attention d'un ennemi pendant 4s.
La cible attaque un de ses propres alliés au hasard.
N'inflige aucun dégât direct.
skills.description_en:
Why fight when you can let the enemy do it for you?
Misdirects the target for 4s: it attacks one of its own allies at random.
Deals no direct damage.

skills.description_fr:
Vole 2 améliorations (+0.1/lvl) à tous les ennemis.
Redistribue les améliorations volées aux alliés.
skills.description_en:
What's yours is now mine.
Steals 2 buffs (+0.1/lvl) from all enemies and redistributes them to allies.
Signature skill of the Trickster.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 18 (+50% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi et applique 1 charge de Saignement.
15% (+1%/lvl) de chances d'infliger Désarmement pendant 1.5s.
skills.description_en:
The cutlass doesn't cut clean, and that's by design.
Deals 18 (+50% ATK) physical damage and applies 1 Bleed stack.
15% (+1%/lvl) chance to inflict Disarm for 1.5s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 20 (+45% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
Ignore la Ligne de Mire.
25% (+1.5%/lvl) de chances d'infliger Étourdissement pendant 1.5s.
skills.description_en:
Black powder knows neither honor nor obstacles.
Deals 20 (+45% ATK) physical damage. Ignores Line of Sight.
25% (+1.5%/lvl) chance to inflict Stun for 1.5s.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 10 (+25% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
Applique Aveuglement : -25% de précision pendant 3s (+0.25s/lvl).
skills.description_en:
A fistful of sand to the face, every pirate's favorite trick.
Deals 10 (+25% ATK) physical damage.
Applies Blind: -25% accuracy for 3s (+0.25s/lvl).

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 12 (+30% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
Vole 15 (+2/lvl) mana à la cible.
30% de chances de voler également 1 amélioration.
skills.description_en:
Everything that glitters ends up in your pockets.
Deals 12 (+30% ATK) physical damage and steals 15 (+2/lvl) mana from the target.
30% chance to also steal 1 buff.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 28 (+55% ATK) dégâts physiques en zone 2x2.
Vole 10% du mana et toutes les améliorations des ennemis touchés.
Applique Aveuglement pendant 2s.
skills.description_en:
The boarding party leaves nothing behind.
Deals 28 (+55% ATK) physical damage in a 2x2 zone.
Steals 10% mana and all buffs from targets. Applies Blind for 2s.
Signature skill of the Corsair.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 16 (+45% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi et applique Challenged pendant 8s (+0.5s/lvl).
Le Duelliste inflige +20% de dégâts aux ennemis Challenged.
skills.description_en:
Steel singles out your opponent.
Deals 16 (+45% ATK) physical damage and applies Challenged for 8s (+0.5s/lvl).
The Duelist deals +20% damage to Challenged targets.

skills.description_fr:
Adopte la posture En Garde pendant 6s (+0.3s/lvl).
Contre-attaque automatiquement avec 30% de chances.
50% de chances si l'attaquant est Challenged.
skills.description_en:
Blade raised, ready to answer every assault.
Adopts the En Garde stance for 6s (+0.3s/lvl).
Automatically counters with a 30% chance (50% if the attacker is Challenged).

skills.description_fr:
Active la Riposte pendant 3s (+0.2s/lvl).
Renvoie 100% des dégâts et altérations subis.
+50% de dégâts renvoyés si l'attaquant est Challenged.
skills.description_en:
Your opponent forges their own defeat.
Activates Riposte for 3s (+0.2s/lvl): reflects 100% of damage and debuffs received.
+50% reflected damage if the attacker is Challenged.

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 10 (+30% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi et applique Exposed pendant 6s (+0.4s/lvl).
Réduit la DEF de la cible de 25% (+1%/lvl).
skills.description_en:
A sharp eye reveals the flaw in the guard.
Deals 10 (+30% ATK) physical damage and applies Exposed for 6s (+0.4s/lvl).
Reduces the target's DEF by 25% (+1%/lvl).

skills.description_fr:
Inflige 35 (+70% ATK) dégâts physiques à un ennemi.
Dégâts x1.5 si la cible est Challenged.
Dégâts x2.0 si la cible est Challenged et Exposed.
skills.description_en:
The duel ends with a single thrust.
Deals 35 (+70% ATK) physical damage.
Damage x1.5 if the target is Challenged. Damage x2.0 if it is Challenged and Exposed.
Signature skill of the Duelist.
